entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
